title: Budget App
about: Event handler, Closures, Data input, IIFE
author: Ricardo Moreira
body:
# **What it is?**

A Budget app made only with Vanilla Javascript. It's from a tutorial. Not yet refactored to 2020.



## What I learned?

* Event handler
* Data input
* IIFE
* Closures
* Modules
* DOM Manipulation
* Keyword this
* Templates

## Links

* [Project page](https://budgetfy.netlify.app/)
* [GitHub page](https://github.com/mugas/budgety)
